name: Advanced Custom Field: Shortcode Field
author: Fumito MIZUNO

sections.description:
When you enter a shortcode, it will be executed and outputted, by using the_field(‘FIELD_NAME_HERE’) in your theme.

You need Advanced Custom Fields plugin by Elliot Condon.
sections.installation:
1. Install Advanced Custom Fields plugin and activate it
  2. Upload shortcode-acf' to the/wp-content/plugins/` directory
sections.changelog:
4.0

  • directory name fix. changed for wordpress.org

3.0

  • support ACF4.0
  • downloadable from wordpress.org

2.0

  • list shortcodes below the fields

1.0

  • initial release

short_description: When you enter a shortcode, it will be executed and outputted, by using the_field('FIELD_NAME_HERE') in your theme.
description:
When you enter a shortcode, it will be executed and outputted, by using the_field(‘FIELD_NAME_HERE’) in your theme.

You need Advanced Custom Fields plugin by Elliot Condon.

screenshots.caption: field for shortcodes, you can view the shortcodes available on your blog.
